## Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

library(geojsonio)
library(sp)
```

## Try 1

```{r}
ggplot(data = df_total, aes(y = MathScores2019, x = District)) +
  geom_point() + xlab("District") + ylab("Average Math Scores in 2019") + ggtitle("Math scores by district") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1, 32, 1))
```

## Plot from JSON

```{r}
plot(json_map, col = "grey")
```

```{r pcp}
    columns = c("ELAScores2019", "ELAScores2022", "MathScores2019", "MathScores2022"), groupColumn = "remote_cat",order='anyClass',

  scale_color_viridis(discrete=TRUE) +
  theme_ipsum()+
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size=10)
  )
```
